reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Apoyo a las poblaciones clave de mayor riesgo al VIH: 2019-2021

description.narrative: Dominican Republic - HIV - Instituto Dermatológico y Cirugía de Piel ‘Dr. Huberto Bogaert Díaz’ - IDCP. This program has the following goals: To reduce new infections among key populations and to increase life expectancy of PLHIV in the Dominican Republic in a sustainable manner.. The objectives of this program are: Strengthening of STI and HIV/AIDS education and prevention programs, emphasizing human rights, gender equality and respect for different sexual orientations and gender identities through joint community management and the participation of key populations. Promote equal access to care, treatment and support services that promote health and ensure retention of PLHIV throughout the care continuum and achieve the lasting suppression of viral loads

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for DOM-H-IDCP
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of transgender people reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
KP-Other 1: Percentage of women in social vulnerability who live in bateyes covered by HIV prevention programs (defined service package)
Percentage of other vulnerable populations reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Outcome indicator for DOM-H-IDCP
Percentage of transgender people reporting using a condom in their most recent sexual intercourse or anal sex
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of other vulnerable populations who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse
HIV O-Other 1: Percentage of women in conditions of social vulnerability residing in bateyes who claim to have used a condom during their last sexual relationship
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
HIV O-Other 3: Percentage of other vulnerable populations who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse (haitian migrants)
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Impact indicator for DOM-H-IDCP
Percentage of transgender people who are living with HIV
HIV I-Other 1: Percentage of women in conditions of social vulnerability residing in bateyes living with HIV
Percentage of other vulnerable populations (specify) who are living with HIV
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
HIV I-other 2: Percentage of other vulnerable populations (haitian migrants) who are living with HIV
